newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Paranapanema posts loss Jan-Sept.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Paranapanema posts loss Jan-Sept.

text.p: Brazilian mining giant Paranapanema SA posted a loss of 18.88 million reais in the January to September period.
The company's financial director Helio Blak said the nine-month results could not be compared with the previous year because of the change in the company's structure.
The Paranapanema group now includes four metals or mining companies in addition to the original Paranapanema tin company.
Last year, the Paranapanema tin company posted a 15.07 million real profit in the January to September period.
-- Simona de Logu, Rio de Janeiro newsroom, 5521 5074151
